java.lang.String name()
Get an identifying name

Returns:
a name of the messenger

getDataInputStream

java.io.DataInputStream getDataInputStream()
Get the data input stream. Messages will be read from this stream and placed on an inbound queue.

Returns:
the data input stream

getDataOutputStream

java.io.DataOutputStream getDataOutputStream()
Get the data output stream. Messages will be pulled from the outbound queue and sent on this stream.

Returns:
the data output stream

getInboundQueue

MessageQueue getInboundQueue()
Get the queue where we grab inbound messages. One or more ReaderThreads will be putting messages in this queue. They need to be dequeued and processed,

Returns:
the queue where we place inbound messages

getOutboundQueue

MessageQueue getOutboundQueue()
Get the queue where we place outbound messages. A WriterThread will be grabbing the messages and sending them to their destination.

Returns:
the queue where we place outbound messages ready for transmission.
